title: Music Director's Scholarship Fund
description: To provide support for the LYNX National Arts and Media Camps in the College of Arts and Media to foster recruitment of camp participants.  This fund will be converted to an endowment if it reaches $25,000 by June 2021.
marketingContent: To provide support for the LYNX National Arts and Media Camps in the College of Arts and Media to foster recruitment of camp participants.  This fund will be converted to an endowment if it reaches $25,000 by June 2021.
